tasks.instruction:
Redesign the LegalLetter AI app with a consistent light blue gradient theme. Implement:
1. Light blue gradient color scheme throughout the app
2. Shiny effects on all buttons with hover animations
3. Subtle animations to make content pop
4. Use light blue gradient as the primary accent color
5. Update all components to follow the new design system
6. Ensure consistency across all pages (Auth, Dashboard, Admin, etc.)
7. Add smooth transitions and micro-interactions
